QuestData.Title: I'm Not Supposed to Tell You This
QuestData.Description: My daddy always kept two swords: one for fighting with men, and one for hunting the animals. I wasn't supposed to touch his swords, but I knew where he hid them.$b$bOne day, he told my mommy that he was going to fight a "lone hunter" in the hills to the east, but he brought his animal sword with him! When he came back, he didn't have his sword with him.$b$bWhen daddy comes back, he'll be so happy when I give him his animal sword! Will you go and find it?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain Joseph's Hunting Blade from The Lone Hunter in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestData.CompletionText: Daddy loved his animal sword. He seemed sad when he didn't have it anymore.
QuestData.RewardText: That's my daddy's sword! How did you find it? Did you find the bad hunter?
